comments: Retrieves the login report between the two instants for a particular user by login Id, using specific loginIdTypes. If you specify an application id, it will only return the

params.name: start
comments: The start instant as UTC milliseconds since Epoch.

params.name: end
comments: The end instant as UTC milliseconds since Epoch.

params.name: loginIdTypes
comments: the identity types that FusionAuth will compare the loginId to. Defaults to [email, username]
